types.name: AsyncSchemaRegistryDeserializer<T>
types.summary: An that resolves Avro schemas on the fly. When deserializing messages, this deserializer will attempt to derive a schema ID from the first five bytes. (For more information, see the Confluent wire format documentation.) If a schema with that ID is not found in cache, it will attempt to pull down a matching schema from the Schema Registry.

types.name: AsyncSchemaRegistrySerializer<T>
types.summary:
An <see cref="T:Confluent.Kafka.IAsyncSerializer`1" /> that resolves Avro schemas on the fly. When serializing
            messages, this serializer will attempt to look up a subject that matches the topic name (if
            not already cached).

types.name: AutomaticRegistrationBehavior
types.summary: Options for automatic schema registration by Schema Registry serializers.

types.name: ConsumerBuilderExtensions
types.summary:
A collection of convenience methods for <see cref="T:Confluent.Kafka.ConsumerBuilder`2" /> that
            configure Avro deserializers.

types.name: ISchemaRegistryDeserializerBuilder
types.summary:
Builds <see cref="T:IDeserializer{T}" />s based on specific schemas from a Schema Registry
            instance.

types.name: ISchemaRegistrySerializerBuilder
types.summary:
Builds <see cref="T:ISerializer{T}" />s based on specific schemas from a Schema Registry
            instance.

types.name: ProducerBuilderExtensions
types.summary:
A collection of convenience methods for <see cref="T:Confluent.Kafka.ProducerBuilder`2" />
            and <see cref="T:Confluent.Kafka.DependentProducerBuilder`2" /> that configure Avro serializers.

types.name: SchemaRegistryDeserializerBuilder
types.summary:
Builds <see cref="T:IDeserializer{T}" />s based on specific schemas from a Schema Registry
            instance.

types.name: SchemaRegistrySerializerBuilder
types.summary:
Builds <see cref="T:ISerializer{T}" />s based on specific schemas from a Schema Registry
            instance.

types.name: TombstoneBehavior
types.summary: Options for serializing and deserializing null record components.
